details.description: Deployed full-stack Node.js app on AWS EC2, configured Nginx reverse proxy & PM2. Implemented in-browser AI processing using Puter.js for ATS, reducing manual HR screening time by 40%. Migrated legacy codebase to Next.js, boosting Lighthouse score from 78 → 93.

Built dashboard components using React.js + Material UI + Redux for real-time large dataset sync. Integrated secure AWS S3 file handling APIs. Ensured reliability using Jest unit tests & Zod input validation.
Real-time bi-directional platform supporting 50+ concurrent users. Deployed on Azure with Redis Pub/Sub. Built with Next.js, TS, Express, Socket.io, and Redis.
Migrated DB from MongoDB → PostgreSQL, optimized SQL queries. Built analytics dashboard improving engagement by 10%. Tech stack: Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Highcharts.
Architected secure hotel booking system with JWT auth. Implemented 2dsphere geospatial indexing with OpenStreetMap. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, EJS.
